1.title: Sainsbury's and C4 Present 2012 David Clarke Pt II
1.plot: The blind footballer reveals his football skills and tells how gold is the only medal he cares about as he prepares for victory at the Paralympics.

2.title: Sainsbury's and C4 Present 2012 Ellie Simmonds Pt II
2.plot: Double gold medal-winning swimmer Ellie Simmonds reveals how she's managing the pressure of aiming to replicate her previous successes at the 2012 Paralylimpics.

3.title: Sainsbury's and C4 Present 2012 Stephen Miller Pt II
3.plot: The club thrower and treble gold medallist gives a insight into his extraordinary mental and physical strength as he prepares for the 2012 Paralympics.

4.title: Sainsbury's and C4 Present 2012 Danielle Brown Pt II
4.plot: For Paralympics gold medallist archer Danielle Brown, winning is all-important. This film reveals her determination to train harder than her competitors and her hunger for victory at London 2012.

5.title: Sainsbury's and C4 Present 2012 David Smith Pt II
5.plot: David Smith, Boccia player and Paralympics gold medallist, gives a fascinating insight into the psychological techniques and demands of competing at an elite level.

6.title: Sainsbury's & C4 Present 2012 Mandip Sehmi Pt II
6.plot: Paralympics wheelchair rugby player and double European Champion gold medallist Mandip Sehmi talks about his preparations for the 2012 games.

7.title: Sainsbury's & C4 Present 2012 Hannah Cockroft Pt II
7.plot: Nineteen-year-old Hannah Cockroft, Paralympic wheelchair racer and double World Champion, reveals her innermost thoughts and rituals as she resolutely prepares and trains for victory at London 2012.

8.title: Sainsbury's & C4 Present 2012 Will Bayley Pt II
8.plot: The world no 2 table tennis Paralympian and European champion talks about his determination to win gold at London 2012.

9.title: Sainsbury's & C4 Present 2012 Helen Turner
9.plot: Helen Turner, Paralympics basketball player and World Cup gold medallist, talks about the training and commitment needed to compete at an elite level.

10.title: Sainsbury's & C4 Present 2012 Jody Cundy Pt II
10.plot: Indomitable track cyclist Jody Cundy MBE is constantly striving to redefine what his body can do through training, in a sport where 1/1000 of a second can be the difference between winning and losing.

1.title: Sainsbury's and Channel 4 Present David Clarke 2012
1.plot: The blind football paralympian's nine-year-old son gives an insight to his father's life and his preparations for the 2012 London Paralympics.

2.title: Sainsbury's and Channel 4 Present Ellie Simmonds 2012
2.plot: Billy Pye MBE, Ellie's coach and mentor, gives an insight into the intriguing character behind this extraordinary Paralympic Gold Medallist swimmer.

3.title: Sainsbury's and Channel 4 Present Stephen Miller 2012
3.plot: The triple Paralympic Gold Medallist club thrower's fiancée Rachel gives a compelling insight into one of Britain's most successful athletes.

4.title: Sainsbury's and Channel 4 Present Danielle Brown 2012
4.plot: The Paralympic Gold Medallist's younger sister Georgie shares her personal perspective on the golden girl of archery.

5.title: Sainsbury's and Channel 4 Present David Smith 2012
5.plot: The Paralympic Gold Medallist boccia player's fiancée Kathryn gives an intimate insight into the brainy and chivalrous character of this superb sportsman.

6.title: Sainsbury's and Channel 4 Present Mandip Sehmi 2012
6.plot: Mandip's sister Mani shares her personal perspective on her single-minded brother, the Paralympic wheelchair rugby player.

7.title: Sainsbury's and Channel 4 Present Hannah Cockroft 2012
7.plot: Hannah's best friend, Hannah Conboy, gives an engaging and personal insight into the vivacious character of the teen Paralympic wheelchair racer and double World Champion.

8.title: Sainsbury's and Channel 4 Present Will Bayley 2012
8.plot: Paralympian table tennis teammate Joe gives an insight into his charming, cheeky friend Will, who's currently ranked as number two in the world.

9.title: Sainsbury's and Channel 4 Present Joe Bestwick 2012
9.plot: Friend and rock singer Lamey gives his perspective on his mate Joe, the Paralympic wheelchair basketball bronze medallist who enthrals with his slams and dunks on the court.

10.title: Sainsbury's and Channel Present Jody Cundy 2012
10.plot: Track cyclist and five times Paralympic gold medallist Jody's mother gives a touching and telling insight into one of Great Britain's most decorated male Paralympians.

imdb.title: Sainsbury's and channel 4 present
plot: _Sainsbury's and channel 4 present_ (qv) profiles of some of the elite paralympians who'll be aiming to win gold for great britain in 2012.
